name: test_e2e_with_logs[433_GQL_DATA_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `GQL_DATA_004` |
| **Name** | GraphQL encoded users with password extraction |
| **Category** | GRAPHQL |
| **Subcategory** | data_extraction |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{users(first:10){id,password}}`
- **Encoded**: `%7Busers(first%3A10)%7Bid%2Cpassword%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~47000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:31:23.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX GraphQL Attack] Mass data extraction attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=GQL_DATA_004-1770841883811-phw7u pattern_id=GQL_DATA_004 uri=/?q=%7Busers(first%3A10)%7Bid%2Cpassword%7D client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=GQL_DATA_004-1770841883811-phw7u pattern_id=GQL_DATA_004 uri=/?q=%7Busers(first%3A10)%7Bid%2Cpassword%7D client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
20:31:23.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=GQL_DATA_004-1770841883811-phw7u pattern_id=GQL_DATA_004 uri=/?q=%7Busers(first%3A10)%7Bid%2Cpassword%7D client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
